creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: stately white building near center of image; small figure with staff near gate around estate; trees at L and R of image; heavy foliage around fence and estate
inscription:
Signature, Title

-- in graphite at bottom margin: M3789-
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: monogram in plate, upper left: [JC] with 5-pointed star; title in plate, top center: Blair
title: Blair Adam
